overview: Some prisoners have broken out of jail and are now on the run. Tristan Jaxx heads straight towards a young detective's home to get what he's been waiting for all along. Some good head and a tight hole. Sean Duran is the other loose prisoner and he sets his sights on Allen Lucas' ass.  The fugitives are still on the run and a cop is about to stumble right into their hiding spot. Lucky for them, this cop takes bribes and soon the men are licking, sucking and fucking each other to a cum bursting conclusion.
title: Fugitives
